title: BIG 12 MEDIA DAYS - DAY 2
description:
Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, Dusty Dvoracek and Andre Ware break down Day 2 of Big 12 Media Days. Steve Sarkisian talks Texas' impending move to the SEC, Brent Venables discusses Year 1 at Oklahoma and Acho gives us his ultimate Big 12 player.
